prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon that resembles a zebra and has striking black and white stripes.
I want a fast Pokemon that has a sleek body and lightning bolt-like features.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a wild stallion with electric powers.
Make a quadrupedal Pokemon that combines agility and speed with a striking black and white color scheme.
Imagine a Pokemon that charges through grasslands with electric energy and has a wild personality.
Design a Pokemon known for its speed, with a body adorned in bold black and white patterns.
Show me a Pokemon that can unleash powerful electric attacks and has a strong presence in battles.
